title._content: Image taken from page 12 of 'The Complete Correspondence and Works of Charles Lamb. With an essay on his life and genius by G. A. Sala'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Complete Correspondence and Works of Charles Lamb. With an essay on his life and genius by G. A. Sala", "Works" Author: Lamb, Charles Contributor: SALA, George Augustus Henry Fairfield. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12272.bbb.5."
